scripts.postinstall: npm run copy-libs && npm run transpile
scripts.copy-libs: node scripts/copy-libs src/lib && npm run symlink-polythene
scripts.watch: npm run watch-css & npm run watch-es6
scripts.transpile: npm run transpile-css && npm run transpile-js
scripts.github: rimraf ../../gh-pages-examples/app && rimraf ../../gh-pages-examples/*.html && rimraf ../../gh-pages-examples/lib && rimraf ../../gh-pages-examples/config.js && npm run build && npm run build-copy-to-gh
scripts.clean: rimraf ./build && rimraf ./src/lib && find ./src/app -name "*.js" -not -name "*.es6.js" -print | xargs rimraf && find ./src/app -name "*.css" -print | xargs rimraf && rimraf ./node_modules
